title.text: RFC 3362:  Real-time Facsimile (T.38) - image/t38 MIME Sub-type Registration

contents.text:
Network Working Group                                         G. Parsons
Request for Comments: 3362                               Nortel Networks
Category: Standards Track                                    August 2002
Real-time Facsimile (T.38) - image/t38 MIME Sub-type Registration
contents.zh-CHS: 实时传真（T.38）-图像/t38 MIME子类型注册

contents.text: Status of this Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录的状况

contents.text: This document specifies an Internet standards track protocol for the Internet community, and requests discussion and suggestions for improvements. Please refer to the current edition of the "Internet Official Protocol Standards" (STD 1) for the standardization state and status of this protocol. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件规定了互联网社区的互联网标准跟踪协议，并要求进行讨论和提出改进建议。有关本协议的标准化状态和状态，请参考当前版本的“互联网官方协议标准”（STD 1）。本备忘录的分发不受限制。

contents.text: Copyright Notice
contents.zh-CHS: 版权公告

contents.text: Copyright (C) The Internet Society (2002). All Rights Reserved.
contents.zh-CHS: 版权所有（C）互联网协会（2002年）。版权所有。

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This document describes the registration of the MIME sub-type image/t38. The encoding is defined by ITU Recommendation T.38 and is intended for use as an Session Description Protocol (SDP) media descriptor.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档描述MIME子类型image/t38的注册。编码由ITU建议T.38定义，旨在用作会话描述协议（SDP）媒体描述符。

contents.text: 1. Conventions used in this document
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 本文件中使用的公约

contents.text: The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in BCP 14, RFC 2119 [REQ].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件中的关键词“必须”、“不得”、“要求”、“应”、“不应”、“应”、“不应”、“建议”、“可”和“可选”应按照BCP 14、RFC 2119[REQ]中的说明进行解释。

contents.text: 2. Overview
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 概述

contents.text: This document describes the registration of the MIME sub-type image/t38. The encoding is defined by [T.38] and is intended for use as an SDP media descriptor.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档描述MIME子类型image/t38的注册。编码由[T.38]定义，旨在用作SDP媒体描述符。

contents.text: 3. T.38 Definition

ITU-T Recommendation T.38 [T.38] describes the technical features necessary to transfer facsimile documents in real-time between two standard Group 3 facsimile terminals over the Internet or other networks using IP protocols. The Recommendation allows the use of either TCP or UDP depending on the service environment.
contents.zh-CHS: ITU-T建议T.38[T.38]描述了使用IP协议在互联网或其他网络上的两个标准第3组传真终端之间实时传输传真文件所需的技术特征。该建议允许根据服务环境使用TCP或UDP。

contents.text: ITU-T Recommendation T.38 [T.38] Annex D describes system level requirements and procedures for internet aware facsimile implementations and internet aware facsimile gateways conforming to ITU-T T.38 to establish calls with other ITU-T T.38 implementations using the procedures defined in IETF RFC 2543 [SIP-99] and IETF RFC 2327 [SDP].
contents.zh-CHS: ITU-T建议T.38[T.38]附录D描述了符合ITU-T.38的互联网感知传真实现和互联网感知传真网关的系统级要求和程序，以使用IETF RFC 2543[SIP-99]和IETF RFC 2327[SDP]中定义的程序与其他ITU-T T.38实现建立呼叫。

contents.text: Note that ITU-T T.38 Recommendation T.38 (04/02) [T.38] is an aggregation of the original ITU-T Recommendation T.38 (06/98) [T.38- 98] and all of the subsequent Amendments and Corrigendum including [T.38D-00]. While [T.38] and [T.38D-00] describe SIP procedures per [SIP-99], the procedures can also be applied to the revised Session Initiation Protocol specification [SIP].
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，ITU-T.38建议T.38（04/02）[T.38]是原始ITU-T建议T.38（06/98）[T.38-98]以及包括[T.38D-00]在内的所有后续修订和勘误的汇总。虽然[T.38]和[T.38D-00]根据[SIP-99]描述了SIP程序，但这些程序也可以应用于修订的会话启动协议规范[SIP]。

contents.text: 3.1 image/t38 Usage
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1 图像/t38的使用

contents.text: Annex D of [T.38] describes that the image/t38 media type is intended to indicate a T.38 media stream in SDP.
contents.zh-CHS: [T.38]的附录D描述了图像/t38媒体类型旨在指示SDP中的T.38媒体流。

contents.text: This media type registration is not intended for email usage.
contents.zh-CHS: 此媒体类型注册不适用于电子邮件使用。

contents.text: 4. IANA Registration
contents.zh-CHS: 4. IANA注册

contents.text:
To: ietf-types@iana.org
Subject: Registration of Standard MIME media type image/t38
MIME media type name: image
contents.zh-CHS: MIME媒体类型名称：映像

contents.text: MIME subtype name: t38
contents.zh-CHS: MIME子类型名称：t38

contents.text: Required parameters: none
contents.zh-CHS: 所需参数：无

contents.text: Optional parameters: none
contents.zh-CHS: 可选参数：无

contents.text: Encoding considerations: Binary
contents.zh-CHS: 编码注意事项：二进制

contents.text: Security considerations:
contents.zh-CHS: 安全考虑：

contents.text: This content denotes a facsimile bit stream that may or may not be encrypted.
contents.zh-CHS: 该内容表示可以加密或不加密的传真比特流。

contents.text: Interoperability considerations :
contents.zh-CHS: 互操作性注意事项：

contents.text: This MIME media subtype is intended to be used as a parameter by SDP in SIP call setup for T.38 as described in ITU-T Rec. T.38 Annex D. Any use of this media type by email applications is not defined and as a result is not guaranteed to interoperate with a T.38 stream.
contents.zh-CHS: 如ITU-T Rec.T.38附录D所述，此MIME媒体子类型拟由SDP在T.38的SIP呼叫设置中用作参数。未定义电子邮件应用程序对该媒体类型的任何使用，因此不保证与T.38流进行互操作。

contents.text: Published specification:
contents.zh-CHS: 已发布的规范：

contents.text: ITU-T Recommendation T.38, 'Procedures for real-time Group 3 facsimile communication over IP networks', April 2002.
contents.zh-CHS: ITU-T建议T.38，“通过IP网络进行实时第3组传真通信的程序”，2002年4月。

contents.text: A copy of the T.38 specifications can be found at:
contents.zh-CHS: T.38规范的副本可在以下网址找到：

contents.text:
http://www.itu.int/rec/recommendation.asp?type=folders&
lang=e&parent=T-REC-T.38
Applications which use this media type:
contents.zh-CHS: 使用此媒体类型的应用程序：

contents.text: Real-time facsimile (fax)
contents.zh-CHS: 实时传真（传真）

contents.text: Additional information:
contents.zh-CHS: 其他信息：

contents.text:
Magic number(s):
     II (little-endian):
     MM (big-endian):
File extension(s): .T38
Macintosh File Type Code(s): T38
Person & email address to contact for further information:
contents.zh-CHS: 联系人和电子邮件地址，以获取更多信息：

contents.text: Glenn W. Parsons gparsons@nortelnetworks.com
contents.zh-CHS: 格伦·W·帕森斯gparsons@nortelnetworks.com

contents.text: Intended usage: COMMON
contents.zh-CHS: 预期用途：普通

contents.text: Change controller: Glenn Parsons
contents.zh-CHS: 变更控制员：格伦·帕森斯

contents.text: 5. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 安全考虑

contents.text: Security considerations for this media type are discussed in the MIME type registration that appears in section 4.
contents.zh-CHS: 第4节中出现的MIME类型注册中讨论了此媒体类型的安全注意事项。

contents.zh-CHS: 6. 工具书类

contents.zh-CHS: [REQ]Bradner，S.，“在RFC中用于指示需求水平的关键词”，BCP 14，RFC 2119，1997年3月。

contents.zh-CHS: [MIME4]Freed，N.和N.Borenstein，“多用途互联网邮件扩展（MIME）第四部分：注册程序”，BCP 13，RFC 2048，1996年11月。

contents.text: [SDP] Handley, M. and V. Jacobson, "SDP: Session Description Protocol", RFC 2327, April 1998.
contents.zh-CHS: [SDP]Handley，M.和V.Jacobson，“SDP：会话描述协议”，RFC 2327，1998年4月。

contents.text: [SIP] Rosenberg, J., Schulzrinne, H., Camarillo, G., Johnston, A., Peterson, J., Sparks, R., Handley, M. and E. Schooler, "SIP: Session Initiation Protocol", RFC 3261, June 2002.
contents.zh-CHS: [SIP]Rosenberg，J.，Schulzrinne，H.，Camarillo，G.，Johnston，A.，Peterson，J.，Sparks，R.，Handley，M.和E.Schooler，“SIP：会话启动协议”，RFC 3261，2002年6月。

contents.text: [SIP-99] Handley, M., Schulzrinne, H., Schooler, E. and J. Rosenberg, "SIP: Session Initiation Protocol", RFC 2543, March 1999.
contents.zh-CHS: [SIP-99]Handley，M.，Schulzrinne，H.，Schooler，E.和J.Rosenberg，“SIP：会话启动协议”，RFC 25431999年3月。

contents.text: [T.38] ITU-T Recommendation T.38, 'Procedures for real-time Group 3 facsimile communication over IP networks', April 2002.
contents.zh-CHS: [T.38]ITU-T建议T.38，“通过IP网络进行实时第3组传真通信的程序”，2002年4月。

contents.text: [T.38-98] ITU-T Recommendation T.38, 'Procedures for real-time Group 3 facsimile communication over IP networks', June 1998.
contents.zh-CHS: [T.38-98]ITU-T建议T.38，“通过IP网络进行实时第3组传真通信的程序”，1998年6月。

contents.text: [T.38D-00] ITU-T Recommendation T.38 Amendment 2 Annex D, 'SIP/SDP Call Establishment Procedures', February 2000.
contents.zh-CHS: [T.38D-00]ITU-T建议T.38修正案2附录D，“SIP/SDP呼叫建立程序”，2000年2月。
